game.title: Defeat the Evil Lich
game.objective: Slay the Evil Lich and bring peace to the kingdom.
game.description: The Evil Lich has been terrorizing the kingdom for years, and it's up to you to stop him. Travel to his lair, defeat his minions, and face him in a final showdown.
game.reward: A powerful magical artifact and the gratitude of the kingdom.

task.description: Ascend the ancient mountain pass, avoiding the cursed forest on your way. Beware of the treacherous ice traps.
task.location: Cursed Forest, then Ancient Mountain Pass

task.description: Once you reach the frozen chambers, defeat the Lich's ice golem and his undead retainers. Beware of their icy attacks.
The final battle awaits at the heart of the lair. Beware of the Lich's dark magic and his powerful staff.
